value.title: Elon Musk teases a new image-labeling system for X… we think?
value.content: Elon Musk says X will begin identifying "manipulated media" but doesn't share details.

value.title: WhatsApp will now charge AI chatbots to operate in Italy
value.content: WhatsApp plans to charge developers of AI chatbots per message.

value.title: Chrome takes on AI browsers with tighter Gemini integration, agentic features for autonomous tasks
value.content: Google Chrome is adding Gemini in the sidebar and is rolling out an agentic feature for AI Pro and Ultra users.

value.title: Apple tells Patreon to move creators to in-app purchase for subscriptions by November
value.content: Patreon isn’t happy about Apple’s new subscription billing mandate, arguing Apple’s shifting rules create uncertainty for creators.

value.title: With Apple’s new Creator Studio Pro, AI is a tool to aid creation, not replace it
value.content: Apple’s Creator Studio Pro leverages AI to help creators with tedious tasks — like finding clips or building slides — without trying to do the work for them.

value.title: TechCrunch Disrupt 2026: Plus-one passes are almost gone and only 3 days remain
value.content: The TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 plus-one passes at 50% off are almost sold out, and this deal ends in 3 days. Register here before this deal ends on Friday, January 30 at 11:59 p.m. PT.

value.title: LinkedIn will let you show off your vibe-coding chops with a certificate
value.content: LinkedIn is partnering with Descript, Lovable, Replit, and Relay.app at launch.

value.title: The conference where founders scale: TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026 tickets are now live at the lowest prices
value.content: TechCrunch Founder Summit 2026 unites 1,100 founders and investors in Boston on June 23 for a day focused on real-world scaling insights and networking that pushes the needle. Save up to $300 on your ticket.

value.title: Google Photos brings its prompt-based editing feature to India, Australia, and Japan
value.content: Google is bringing AI-powered photo editing to more users around the world, making it easier to fix your photos with simple text commands instead of complicated editing tools.

value.title: What you should know about the owners of US TikTok
value.content: The newly formed entity, “TikTok USDS Joint Venture LLC,” licenses TikTok’s recommendation algorithm from ByteDance and independently manages content moderation, and oversees data protection, algorithm security, and software controls.

value.title: Bluesky teases 2026 roadmap: A better Discover feed, real-time features, and more
value.content: Bluesky is teasing new features  and improvements ranging from the Discover feed to video support.

value.title: TikTok says it’s still working to recover its US infrastructure
value.content: TikTok says some of the glitches continue but it's making "significant progress" in recovering its U.S. infrastructure.

value.title: WhatsApp is rolling out a new stricter security setting to protect users from cyberattacks
value.content: Strict Account Settings adds restrictions like automatically blocking media and attachments from unknown senders, and silencing calls from unknown numbers.

value.title: Google now lets users jump from AI Overviews into AI Mode conversations
value.content: The tech giant also announced that it's making Gemini 3 the new default model for AI Overviews globally.

value.title: Phoebe Gates and Sophia Kianni’s Phia raises $35M to ‘make shopping fun again’
value.content: “We are just at such a prime time of opportunity,” Gates said to explain the new fundraise. “Commerce itself for the consumer hasn’t really been adapted in the last 30 years, and the opportunity to make a truly personalized, end-to-end shopping experience is today.”

value.title: Pinterest layoffs impact 15% of staff as resources redirected to AI
value.content: Pinterest says it's "reallocating resources to AI-focused roles and teams that drive AI adoption and execution" and "prioritizing AI‑powered products and capabilities."

value.title: Node-based design tool Flora raises $42M from Redpoint Ventures
value.content: Flora lets customers use image, text, or video to create media assets, including images and video. Users can also use prompts to create modifications to build new nodes with multiple iterations. These generated versions are mapped with each other on a canvas to give you a tractable flow of creation.

value.title: Meta to test premium subscriptions on Instagram, Facebook, and WhatsApp
value.content: In the coming months, Meta is going to explore a premium experience on Instagram, Facebook, and WhatsApp that gives users access to special features and more control over how they share and connect, while keeping the core experiences free.

value.title: Social network UpScrolled sees surge in downloads following TikTok’s US takeover
value.content: UpScrolled is a social network that pledges to remain impartial to political agendas. It blends familiar features from Instagram and X, letting users share photos, videos, and text posts, discover new content, and send direct messages.

value.title: TikTok alternative Skylight soars to 380K+ users after TikTok US deal finalized
value.content: Skylight, co-founded by CEO Tori White and CTO Reed Harmeyer, offers a built-in video editor; user profiles; support for likes, commenting, and sharing; and the ability for community curators to create custom feeds for others to follow.
